title: Fox Announces $5 Billion Stock Buyback
text:
Fox Announces $5 Billion Stock Buyback The media company reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings By Shalini.Ramachandran@wsj.com Updated Aug. 5, 2015 8:22 p.m. ET 
21st Century Fox Inc. on Wednesday announced a $5 billion stock buyback as it reported earnings for the June 30 quarter that highlighted slowdowns in its broadcast TV and filmed entertainment divisions. 
In the Fox broadcast unit, revenue fell 4% to $987 million as lower ratings for shows like “American Idol” and “The Following” pulled down ratings. That, combined with higher programming costs, led to a 22% drop in operating income... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
